title: Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Zhuravka, Krolevets, Basivka of Sumy region, Kozacha Lopan, Tsyrkuny, Vovchansk, Loz...
content: Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Zhuravka, Krolevets, Basivka of Sumy region, Kozacha Lopan, Tsyrkuny, Vovchansk, Lozova, Hrushkivka, Stepova Novosilka, Kupyansk of Kharkiv region, Ivanivka, Myrne, Lyman, Zarichne, Siversk, Zakitne, Novomarkove, Toretsk, Druzhba, Dachne, Ulakly, Yelyzavetivka, Kurakhove, Velyka Novosilka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine reports
author: Live UA Map
